# 강수량 {#convert-example}


```{r}
library(httr)

rain_req <- glue::glue("http://openAPI.seoul.go.kr:8088/",
                       "{Sys.getenv('DATA_RAIN_APIKEY')}/xml/ListRainfallService/1/5/")

xml2::read_xml(rain_req)

rain_response <- GET(rain_req, verbose())

content(rain_response)

library(rvest)

read_html(rain_req, encoding = "cp949")

```
